Update.Changes: Start command line uninstallers minimized if running quiet Minimize automatizer daemon by default Install location of chocolatey is now detected Improved "Uninstall in Chocolatey" junk confidence Added "Improve wallpaper quality" tweak Clearer naming of "Show x under This PC" tweaks Always run loud uninstaller if user clicks "Run uninstaller" in uninstall progress window Made Drive junk scanner thread-safe, code cleanup Added Turkish translation by Harun Güngör Merged French translation update by Thierry ... and many fixes and tweaks
